import { useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import "./TaskForm.css" const TaskForm = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const task = location.state?.task; // get task if passed const { register, handleSubmit, reset, formState: { errors }, } = useForm(); // Prefill form if editing useEffect(() => { if (task) { reset({ type: task.type ? task.type.toLowerCase() : "", title: task.title || "", description: task.task_description || "", epicName: task.epicName || "", startDate: task.start_date || "", endDate: task.due_date || "", status: task.status || "", priority: task.priority || "", estimate: task.estimation || "", assignee: task.assignee || "", labels: task.labels || "", sprint: task.sprint || "", parentTask: task.parentTask || "", }); } }, [task, reset]); const onSubmit = (data) => { if (task) { // Update logic here console.log("Update task:", { ...task, ...data }); } else { // Create logic here console.log("Create task:", data); } navigate("/"); }; return (

{task ? "Edit Task" : "+Create Task"}

{/*type*/}
{errors.type && This field is required}
{errors.title && This field is required}
{/* Task Description */}
